message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. This way, we can both walk away with something.
My turn! How about a 70/30 split in my favor?  Let's not drag this out and lose money to inflation.
I'm willing to compromise a bit more.  Let's do 60/40,  this is getting close to the end and inflation is hurting us both.
Okay, Alice, let's be reasonable. 65/35 seems fair. Time is running out, and we both lose if this drags on.
This is getting risky. Let's split it 50/50 and get something out of this.
